content.thinking: The user wants me to check tasks.md and report the number of incomplete tasks. Let me read the tasks.md file to count them.

1â†’# Tasks: Phase 13D - True Self-Hosting Achievement
     2â†’
     3â†’**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/001-true-self-hosting/`
     4â†’**Prerequisites**: plan.md (required), spec.md (required), research.md, data-model.md, contracts/
     5â†’
     6â†’**Tests**: TDD is REQUIRED per Constitution VII. Tests MUST be written first and fail before implementation.
     7â†’
     8â†’**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing.
     9â†’
    10â†’## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`
    11â†’
    12â†’- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
    13â†’- **[Story]**: Which user story (US1-US6)
    14â†’- Include exact file paths
    15â†’
    16â†’---
    17â†’
    18â†’## Phase 1: Setup (Shared Infrastructure)
    19â†’
    20â†’**Purpose**: Project initialization and test infrastructure
    21â†’
    22â†’- [ ] T001 Create test directory structure at tests/unit/stage0/
    23â†’- [ ] T002 [P] Add stage0 test package definition in tests/unit/stage0/package.lisp
    24â†’- [ ] T003 [P] Create test runner configuration for stage0 tests in tests/unit/stage0/run-tests.lisp
    25â†’
    26â†’---
    27â†’
    28â†’## Phase 2: Foundational (Blocking Prerequisites)
    29â†’
    30â†’**Purpose**: Core infrastructure required by ALL user stories
    31â†’
    32â†’**âš ï¸ CRITICAL**: No user story work can begin until this phase is complete
    33â†’
    34â†’### Core Evaluator Infrastructure
    35â†’
    36â†’- [ ] T004 Create environment module in src/clysm/stage0/env.lisp with extend-env and lookup functions
    37â†’- [ ] T005 [P] Write unit test for env.lisp in tests/unit/stage0/env-test.lisp (test extend-env, lookup)
    38â†’- [ ] T006 Create base evaluator skeleton in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp with eval-form dispatch
    39â†’- [ ] T007 [P] Write unit test skeleton for eval.lisp in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp
    40â†’- [ ] T008 Create primitives module skeleton in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
    41â†’- [ ] T009 [P] Write unit test skeleton for primitives in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp
    42â†’- [ ] T010 Update src/clysm/stage0/package.lisp to export new functions (eval-form, extend-env, lookup)
    43â†’
    44â†’### Symbol Interning
    45â†’
    46â†’- [ ] T011 Implement intern-symbol function in src/clysm/stage0/globals.lisp (string-based equality)
    47â†’- [ ] T012 [P] Write unit test for symbol interning in tests/unit/stage0/globals-test.lisp
    48â†’
    49â†’**Checkpoint**: Foundation ready - `nix flake check` passes, test infrastructure works
    50â†’
    51â†’---
    52â†’
    53â†’## Phase 3: User Story 1 - Compile Arithmetic Expression (Priority: P1) ðŸŽ¯ MVP
    54â†’
    55â†’**Goal**: `(+ 1 2)` compiles and executes correctly, returning 3
    56â†’
    57â†’**Independent Test**: Run `wasmtime run dist/clysm-stage0.wasm --invoke compile_form "(+ 1 2)"` â†’ returns valid Wasm
    58â†’
    59â†’### Tests for User Story 1
    60â†’
    61â†’> **TDD: Write these tests FIRST, ensure they FAIL before implementation**
    62â†’
    63â†’- [ ] T013 [P] [US1] Test fixnum evaluation in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(eval-form 42 nil)` â†’ 42
    64â†’- [ ] T014 [P] [US1] Test addition primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(+ 1 2)` â†’ 3
    65â†’- [ ] T015 [P] [US1] Test subtraction primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(- 5 3)` â†’ 2
    66â†’- [ ] T016 [P] [US1] Test multiplication primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(* 3 4)` â†’ 12
    67â†’- [ ] T017 [P] [US1] Test division primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(/ 10 2)` â†’ 5
    68â†’- [ ] T018 [P] [US1] Test nested arithmetic in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(+ 1 (* 2 3))` â†’ 7
    69â†’- [ ] T019 [P] [US1] Contract test compile_form returns valid Wasm in tests/contract/stage0-exports-test.lisp
    70â†’
    71â†’### Implementation for User Story 1
    72â†’
    73â†’- [ ] T020 [US1] Implement fixnum type check (i31ref detection) in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
    74â†’- [ ] T021 [US1] Implement eval-form for fixnum literals in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
    75â†’- [ ] T022 [P] [US1] Implement prim-add (+) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
    76â†’- [ ] T023 [P] [US1] Implement prim-sub (-) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
    77â†’- [ ] T024 [P] [US1] Implement prim-mul (*) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
    78â†’- [ ] T025 [P] [US1] Implement prim-div (/) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
    79â†’- [ ] T026 [US1] Implement arithmetic dispatch in eval-compound in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
    80â†’- [ ] T027 [US1] Update codegen to emit i32.add/sub/mul/div_s for arithmetic in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
    81â†’- [ ] T028 [US1] Wire compile_form export to use eval-form in src/clysm/stage0/exports.lisp
    82â†’- [ ] T029 [US1] Regenerate Stage 0 and verify `wasm-tools validate dist/clysm-stage0.wasm`
    83â†’
    84â†’**Checkpoint**: `(+ 1 2)` compiles, nested arithmetic works, all US1 tests pass
    85â†’
    86â†’---
    87â†’
    88â†’## Phase 4: User Story 2 - Compile Function Definition (Priority: P1)
    89â†’
    90â†’**Goal**: `(defun f (x) x)` produces Wasm module with exported function "f"
    91â†’
    92â†’**Independent Test**: Compile `(defun identity (x) x)` â†’ Wasm exports callable "identity"
    93â†’
    94â†’### Tests for User Story 2
    95â†’
    96â†’- [ ] T030 [P] [US2] Test defun parsing in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - extracts name, params, body
    97â†’- [ ] T031 [P] [US2] Test simple defun evaluation in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(defun f (x) x)`
    98â†’- [ ] T032 [P] [US2] Test defun with arithmetic body in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(defun add (a b) (+ a b))`
    99â†’- [ ] T033 [P] [US2] Contract test defun produces exported function in tests/contract/stage0-exports-test.lisp
   100â†’
   101â†’### Implementation for User Story 2
   102â†’
   103â†’- [ ] T034 [US2] Implement eval-defun in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp - extracts name, params, body
   104â†’- [ ] T035 [US2] Register defun in function table in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
   105â†’- [ ] T036 [US2] Implement function call dispatch in eval-compound in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
   106â†’- [ ] T037 [US2] Implement parameter binding for function calls in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
   107â†’- [ ] T038 [US2] Update codegen to emit function section entries in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   108â†’- [ ] T039 [US2] Update codegen to emit export section with function names in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   109â†’- [ ] T040 [US2] Verify multiple defuns produce all exports in Stage 0 output
   110â†’
   111â†’**Checkpoint**: `(defun f (x) x)` works, `(defun add (a b) (+ a b))` callable, all US2 tests pass
   112â†’
   113â†’---
   114â†’
   115â†’## Phase 5: User Story 3 - Achieve Non-Trivial Fixed-Point (Priority: P1)
   116â†’
   117â†’**Goal**: Stage 1 >= 1KB, Stage 1 == Stage 2 (byte-identical)
   118â†’
   119â†’**Independent Test**: `./scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh --json` â†’ status "ACHIEVED", size >= 1024
   120â†’
   121â†’### Tests for User Story 3
   122â†’
   123â†’- [ ] T041 [P] [US3] Integration test Stage 1 size >= 1KB in tests/integration/fixpoint-test.lisp
   124â†’- [ ] T042 [P] [US3] Integration test Stage 1 == Stage 2 in tests/integration/fixpoint-test.lisp
   125â†’- [ ] T043 [P] [US3] Contract test compile_all produces complete module in tests/contract/stage0-exports-test.lisp
   126â†’
   127â†’### Implementation for User Story 3
   128â†’
   129â†’- [ ] T044 [US3] Define bootstrap compiler source forms in src/clysm/stage0/bootstrap-source.lisp
   130â†’- [ ] T045 [US3] Implement compile_all to process form list in src/clysm/stage0/exports.lisp
   131â†’- [ ] T046 [US3] Ensure compile_all emits complete Wasm module (all sections) in src/clysm/stage0/output.lisp
   132â†’- [ ] T047 [US3] Update build/stage1-gen.lisp to use compile_all with bootstrap source
   133â†’- [ ] T048 [US3] Update build/stage2-gen.lisp to use Stage 1 with same bootstrap source
   134â†’- [ ] T049 [US3] Verify Stage 1 >= 1024 bytes with `ls -la dist/clysm-stage1.wasm`
   135â†’- [ ] T050 [US3] Verify `cmp dist/clysm-stage1.wasm dist/clysm-stage2.wasm` returns identical
   136â†’- [ ] T051 [US3] Run `./scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh --json` and confirm status "ACHIEVED"
   137â†’
   138â†’**Checkpoint**: Fixed-point achieved! Stage 1 >= 1KB, Stage 1 == Stage 2, MVP COMPLETE
   139â†’
   140â†’---
   141â†’
   142â†’## Phase 6: User Story 4 - Compile Control Structures (Priority: P2)
   143â†’
   144â†’**Goal**: if, let, let* work correctly in compiled code
   145â†’
   146â†’**Independent Test**: `(if (< 1 2) 10 20)` â†’ 10, `(let ((x 5)) (+ x 3))` â†’ 8
   147â†’
   148â†’### Tests for User Story 4
   149â†’
   150â†’- [ ] T052 [P] [US4] Test if-true branch in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(if t 1 2)` â†’ 1
   151â†’- [ ] T053 [P] [US4] Test if-false branch in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(if nil 1 2)` â†’ 2
   152â†’- [ ] T054 [P] [US4] Test comparison-based if in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(if (< 1 2) 10 20)` â†’ 10
   153â†’- [ ] T055 [P] [US4] Test let binding in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(let ((x 5)) x)` â†’ 5
   154â†’- [ ] T056 [P] [US4] Test let with expression in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(let ((x 5)) (+ x 3))` â†’ 8
   155â†’- [ ] T057 [P] [US4] Test let* sequential binding in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `(let* ((x 1) (y (+ x 1))) y)` â†’ 2
   156â†’
   157â†’### Implementation for User Story 4
   158â†’
   159â†’- [ ] T058 [P] [US4] Implement prim-lt (<) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   160â†’- [ ] T059 [P] [US4] Implement prim-gt (>) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   161â†’- [ ] T060 [P] [US4] Implement prim-num-eq (=) in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   162â†’- [ ] T061 [US4] Implement eval-if in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp with condition evaluation
   163â†’- [ ] T062 [US4] Implement eval-let in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp with environment extension
   164â†’- [ ] T063 [US4] Implement eval-let* in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp with sequential binding
   165â†’- [ ] T064 [US4] Update codegen for if (Wasm if/else block) in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   166â†’- [ ] T065 [US4] Update codegen for local variables in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   167â†’
   168â†’**Checkpoint**: Control structures work, all US4 tests pass
   169â†’
   170â†’---
   171â†’
   172â†’## Phase 7: User Story 5 - Compile Lambda Expressions (Priority: P2)
   173â†’
   174â†’**Goal**: Lambda expressions create callable closures
   175â†’
   176â†’**Independent Test**: `((lambda (x) (+ x 1)) 5)` â†’ 6
   177â†’
   178â†’### Tests for User Story 5
   179â†’
   180â†’- [ ] T066 [P] [US5] Test lambda creation in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - returns closure
   181â†’- [ ] T067 [P] [US5] Test lambda application in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `((lambda (x) x) 42)` â†’ 42
   182â†’- [ ] T068 [P] [US5] Test lambda with arithmetic in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `((lambda (x) (+ x 1)) 5)` â†’ 6
   183â†’- [ ] T069 [P] [US5] Test multi-arg lambda in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `((lambda (x y) (+ x y)) 2 3)` â†’ 5
   184â†’
   185â†’### Implementation for User Story 5
   186â†’
   187â†’- [ ] T070 [US5] Implement make-closure in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp - captures env
   188â†’- [ ] T071 [US5] Implement eval-lambda in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp - returns closure struct
   189â†’- [ ] T072 [US5] Implement apply-closure in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp - binds params, evaluates body
   190â†’- [ ] T073 [US5] Update codegen for closure type emission in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   191â†’- [ ] T074 [US5] Update codegen for call_ref instruction in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   192â†’
   193â†’**Checkpoint**: Lambda works, closures capture environment, all US5 tests pass
   194â†’
   195â†’---
   196â†’
   197â†’## Phase 8: User Story 6 - Support Basic Types and Primitives (Priority: P2)
   198â†’
   199â†’**Goal**: car, cdr, cons, eq work correctly; quote preserves literals
   200â†’
   201â†’**Independent Test**: `(car (cons 1 2))` â†’ 1, `(eq 'a 'a)` â†’ T
   202â†’
   203â†’### Tests for User Story 6
   204â†’
   205â†’- [ ] T075 [P] [US6] Test quote in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp - `'a` â†’ symbol a
   206â†’- [ ] T076 [P] [US6] Test cons creation in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(cons 1 2)` â†’ cons cell
   207â†’- [ ] T077 [P] [US6] Test car in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(car (cons 1 2))` â†’ 1
   208â†’- [ ] T078 [P] [US6] Test cdr in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(cdr (cons 1 2))` â†’ 2
   209â†’- [ ] T079 [P] [US6] Test eq same symbol in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(eq 'a 'a)` â†’ T
   210â†’- [ ] T080 [P] [US6] Test eq different symbols in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp - `(eq 'a 'b)` â†’ NIL
   211â†’
   212â†’### Implementation for User Story 6
   213â†’
   214â†’- [ ] T081 [US6] Implement eval-quote in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp - returns unevaluated form
   215â†’- [ ] T082 [US6] Implement symbol evaluation (lookup in env) in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
   216â†’- [ ] T083 [P] [US6] Implement prim-cons in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   217â†’- [ ] T084 [P] [US6] Implement prim-car in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   218â†’- [ ] T085 [P] [US6] Implement prim-cdr in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   219â†’- [ ] T086 [US6] Implement prim-eq in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp (ref.eq for identity)
   220â†’- [ ] T087 [US6] Update codegen for cons creation (struct.new) in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   221â†’- [ ] T088 [US6] Update codegen for car/cdr (struct.get) in src/clysm/stage0/codegen.lisp
   222â†’
   223â†’**Checkpoint**: All primitives work, quote works, all US6 tests pass
   224â†’
   225â†’---
   226â†’
   227â†’## Phase 9: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns
   228â†’
   229â†’**Purpose**: Final validation, cleanup, and documentation
   230â†’
   231â†’- [ ] T089 Run full test suite with `sbcl --eval "(asdf:test-system :clysm)"`
   232â†’- [ ] T090 Verify `nix flake check` passes
   233â†’- [ ] T091 [P] Update CLAUDE.md with any new patterns discovered
   234â†’- [ ] T092 [P] Add error handling for unsupported forms in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp
   235â†’- [ ] T093 [P] Add division by zero check in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp
   236â†’- [ ] T094 Run quickstart.md validation steps
   237â†’- [ ] T095 Final fixed-point verification with `./scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh --json`
   238â†’
   239â†’---
   240â†’
   241â†’## Dependencies & Execution Order
   242â†’
   243â†’### Phase Dependencies
   244â†’
   245â†’```
   246â†’Phase 1 (Setup)
   247â†’    â†“
   248â†’Phase 2 (Foundational) â”€â”€â†’ BLOCKS all user stories
   249â†’    â†“
   250â†’â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
   251â†’â†“       â†“       â†“       â†“       â†“       â†“
   252â†’US1     US2     US3     US4     US5     US6
   253â†’(P1)    (P1)    (P1)    (P2)    (P2)    (P2)
   254â†’ â”‚       â”‚       â”‚
   255â†’ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â†’ MVP COMPLETE (after US3)
   256â†’                              â†“
   257â†’                        Phase 9 (Polish)
   258â†’```
   259â†’
   260â†’### User Story Dependencies
   261â†’
   262â†’| Story | Depends On | Can Parallel With |
   263â†’|-------|------------|-------------------|
   264â†’| US1 (Arithmetic) | Foundational | - |
   265â†’| US2 (Defun) | US1 (needs arithmetic for body) | - |
   266â†’| US3 (Fixed-Point) | US1, US2 (compile_all needs defun) | - |
   267â†’| US4 (Control) | Foundational | US5, US6 |
   268â†’| US5 (Lambda) | US2 (function calling) | US4, US6 |
   269â†’| US6 (Primitives) | Foundational | US4, US5 |
   270â†’
   271â†’### Critical Path (MVP)
   272â†’
   273â†’```
   274â†’Setup â†’ Foundational â†’ US1 â†’ US2 â†’ US3 â†’ Fixed-Point Achieved!
   275â†’```
   276â†’
   277â†’---
   278â†’
   279â†’## Parallel Execution Examples
   280â†’
   281â†’### Phase 2 Parallelization
   282â†’
   283â†’```bash
   284â†’# Run in parallel (different files):
   285â†’Task: "Write unit test for env.lisp in tests/unit/stage0/env-test.lisp"
   286â†’Task: "Write unit test skeleton for eval.lisp in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp"
   287â†’Task: "Write unit test skeleton for primitives in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
   288â†’```
   289â†’
   290â†’### US1 Tests Parallelization
   291â†’
   292â†’```bash
   293â†’# All US1 tests can run in parallel:
   294â†’Task: "Test fixnum evaluation in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp"
   295â†’Task: "Test addition primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
   296â†’Task: "Test subtraction primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
   297â†’Task: "Test multiplication primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
   298â†’```
   299â†’
   300â†’### US4/US5/US6 Parallelization (After US3)
   301â†’
   302â†’```bash
   303â†’# Once MVP complete, these can all run in parallel:
   304â†’Task: "Implement eval-if in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp"  # US4
   305â†’Task: "Implement make-closure in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp"  # US5
   306â†’Task: "Implement prim-cons in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp"  # US6
   307â†’```
   308â†’
   309â†’---
   310â†’
   311â†’## Implementation Strategy
   312â†’
   313â†’### MVP First (User Stories 1-3)
   314â†’
   315â†’1. Complete Phase 1: Setup (3 tasks)
   316â†’2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational (9 tasks)
   317â†’3. Complete Phase 3: US1 - Arithmetic (17 tasks)
   318â†’4. Complete Phase 4: US2 - Defun (11 tasks)
   319â†’5. Complete Phase 5: US3 - Fixed-Point (11 tasks)
   320â†’6. **STOP and VALIDATE**: Run `./scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh --json`
   321â†’7. **MVP ACHIEVED** when Stage 1 >= 1KB and Stage 1 == Stage 2
   322â†’
   323â†’### Incremental Delivery After MVP
   324â†’
   325â†’1. Add US4 (Control) â†’ Test independently
   326â†’2. Add US5 (Lambda) â†’ Test independently
   327â†’3. Add US6 (Primitives) â†’ Test independently
   328â†’4. Polish phase â†’ Full validation
   329â†’
   330â†’---
   331â†’
   332â†’## Summary
   333â†’
   334â†’| Metric | Count |
   335â†’|--------|-------|
   336â†’| **Total Tasks** | 95 |
   337â†’| **Setup Tasks** | 3 |
   338â†’| **Foundational Tasks** | 9 |
   339â†’| **US1 Tasks (Arithmetic)** | 17 |
   340â†’| **US2 Tasks (Defun)** | 11 |
   341â†’| **US3 Tasks (Fixed-Point)** | 11 |
   342â†’| **US4 Tasks (Control)** | 14 |
   343â†’| **US5 Tasks (Lambda)** | 9 |
   344â†’| **US6 Tasks (Primitives)** | 14 |
   345â†’| **Polish Tasks** | 7 |
   346â†’| **Parallel Opportunities** | 38 tasks marked [P] |
   347â†’
   348â†’**MVP Scope**: US1 + US2 + US3 = 39 tasks (after Foundational)
   349â†’
   350â†’**Success Criteria**: `./scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh --json` shows Stage 1 >= 1KB, Stage 1 == Stage 2
   351â†’

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

file.content:
# Tasks: Phase 13D - True Self-Hosting Achievement

**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/001-true-self-hosting/`
**Prerequisites**: plan.md (required), spec.md (required), research.md, data-model.md, contracts/

**Tests**: TDD is REQUIRED per Constitution VII. Tests MUST be written first and fail before implementation.

**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing.

## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`

- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
- **[Story]**: Which user story (US1-US6)

### User Story Dependencies

| US3 (Fixed-Point) | US1, US2 (compile_all needs defun) | - |
| US4 (Control) | Foundational | US5, US6 |
| US5 (Lambda) | US2 (function calling) | US4, US6 |
| US6 (Primitives) | Foundational | US4, US5 |

### Critical Path (MVP)

```
Setup â†’ Foundational â†’ US1 â†’ US2 â†’ US3 â†’ Fixed-Point Achieved!

## Parallel Execution Examples

### Phase 2 Parallelization

```bash

Task: "Write unit test for env.lisp in tests/unit/stage0/env-test.lisp"
Task: "Write unit test skeleton for eval.lisp in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp"
Task: "Write unit test skeleton for primitives in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
```

### US1 Tests Parallelization

```bash
# All US1 tests can run in parallel:
Task: "Test fixnum evaluation in tests/unit/stage0/eval-test.lisp"
Task: "Test addition primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
Task: "Test subtraction primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
Task: "Test multiplication primitive in tests/unit/stage0/primitives-test.lisp"
```

### US4/US5/US6 Parallelization (After US3)

```bash
# Once MVP complete, these can all run in parallel:
Task: "Implement eval-if in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp"  # US4
Task: "Implement make-closure in src/clysm/stage0/eval.lisp"  # US5
Task: "Implement prim-cons in src/clysm/stage0/primitives.lisp"  # US6
```

## Implementation Strategy

### MVP First (User Stories 1-3)

1. Complete Phase 1: Setup (3 tasks)
2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational (9 tasks)
3. Complete Phase 3: US1 - Arithmetic (17 tasks)
4. Complete Phase 4: US2 - Defun (11 tasks)
5. Complete Phase 5: US3 - Fixed-Point (11 tasks)
6. **STOP and VALIDATE**: Run `./scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh --json`
7. **MVP ACHIEVED** when Stage 1 >= 1KB and Stage 1 == Stage 2

### Incremental Delivery After MVP

1. Add US4 (Control) â†’ Test independently
2. Add US5 (Lambda) â†’ Test independently
3. Add US6 (Primitives) â†’ Test independently
4. Polish phase â†’ Full validation

---
